summary: Completed testing of Market Indices real-time data integration and Articles emoji reduction. All 11 backend API tests passed. All frontend UI tests passed. Market Indices page displays real-time data from DeFiLlama, CoinGecko, and Alternative.me. Articles have no emojis in titles and tables render correctly.
critical_code_review_comments: Real-time APIs are working correctly with proper caching (2-5 min TTL)
Fallback mock data is available if external APIs fail
Articles use MOCKED data from get_mock_articles() as Sanity CMS fallback
seed_data_creation: None - using real API data and mock fallbacks
context_for_next_testing_agent: Market Indices page at /indices fully tested with real-time data from: DeFiLlama (stablecoins, DeFi TVL), CoinGecko (global market data, prices), Alternative.me (Fear & Greed Index). Articles at /articles have no emojis in titles, only owl emoji (ðŸ¦‰) at end of content as signature. Tables render correctly with proper styling.

market_indices_page.details: Page loads at /indices with real-time data displayed

fear_greed_index_api.details: Returns value: 12, classification: 'Extreme Fear' from Alternative.me

stablecoins_api.details: Returns $304B total market cap with top 10 stablecoins from DeFiLlama

defi_tvl_api.details: Returns $95.5B TVL with 24h change from DeFiLlama

global_market_api.details: Returns $2.34T market cap, 56.57% BTC dominance from CoinGecko

market_indices_ui_display.details: All data cards display correctly: Total Market Cap ($2.34T), Stablecoin Market Cap ($304.19B), DeFi TVL ($95.51B), Fear & Greed (12)

articles_no_emojis_in_titles.details: All 5 article titles have no emojis

articles_tables_render.details: Tables render correctly with proper styling (found 2 tables in first article)

articles_owl_signature.details: Owl emoji (ðŸ¦‰) appears at end of article content as signature

api_endpoints_tested.GET /api/: PASS - Returns Alpha Crypto API message
api_endpoints_tested.GET /api/crypto/fear-greed: PASS - Returns Fear & Greed Index from Alternative.me
api_endpoints_tested.GET /api/crypto/stablecoins: PASS - Returns stablecoin data from DeFiLlama
api_endpoints_tested.GET /api/crypto/defi-tvl: PASS - Returns DeFi TVL from DeFiLlama
api_endpoints_tested.GET /api/crypto/global: PASS - Returns global market data from CoinGecko
api_endpoints_tested.GET /api/crypto/prices: PASS - Returns crypto prices (BTC, ETH, SOL, USDC)
api_endpoints_tested.GET /api/articles: PASS - Returns 5 articles with no emojis in titles
api_endpoints_tested.GET /api/articles/1: PASS - Returns single article with tables and owl signature

mocked_data_note: MOCKED: Articles and Airdrops use mock data as fallback when Sanity CMS has insufficient content
